attributes.action: Put the police on the beat.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Move the officers from mundane paper pushing and back onto the streets.
The use of police in vehicles does nothing for the inhabitants of an area or the anti social elements that exist.
Lets see the helpful bobby on the beat back among society instead of being vilified.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
